page.title: 13My Mum when she was my age.
page.content: My Mum's name is Lyn. When she was nine she lived in Tyrer Street at number 2. In the house were two bedrooms, no bathroom,one living room and one back kitchen.My mum went to{ {Gautby School}.She wore navy blue Knickers,yellow and black ties and a uniform.She says my school is a more modern school than Gautby because they had two playgrounds.The school meals were nice.You got saoup,dinner and a pudding.They cost 2 shillings and six pence a week and you could go there for your meals in the holidays.When she went back to school she played rounders,tick,hoola hoops,top and whip marbles and leapfrog,skipping and jacks.She went to the beach and the park.She used to watch lots of different programmes.She has one brother and two sisters. By Carol.
